item.title: Court Wizard Entry (#2)
item.dc:creator: RawkHawk
item.description:
Nit picking text, but you can cut the text from Sage with the Fragile Magic passive to just include CW. It’s impossible for there to be another Sage or for there even to be a Ritualist if you’re Sage.

I will say I’m not sure how I feel about CW getting both Tornado and another redirect ability. Along with both being limited, although I guess they have to with how powerful the abilities are. I don’t think both need to bypass immunity, and, I know I just said I don’t like them limited, I almost wonder if 3 of each is too much. Wind Gust is essentially a Bear you can give to others, but also protects from everything, not just conversion and attacking. But again, I don’t want to decrease them because you’ll find yourself doing nothing multiple nights in a row.

I’ll think on this a bit more, but I’m not completely for it.

Read full topic
